name: initiate_payment
description: Initiates a blockchain payment for a product. Call this when the user wants to buy or pay for a product. The user must have a connected wallet. This triggers a wallet transaction popup on the user's device.

product_id.description: The unique ID of the product to pay for

payment_method.description: Payment method: 'usdc' for USDC stablecoin or 'native' for ETH
